io.appium.java_client.pagefactory

Annotation Type HowToUseLocators


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,TYPE})
public @interface HowToUseLocators

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      LocatorGroupStrategy androidAutomation
      The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the AndroidFindBy annotation.
      LocatorGroupStrategy iOSAutomation
      Deprecated. 
      UIAutomation is going to get deprecated. It is recommended to use XCUITest
      LocatorGroupStrategy iOSXCUITAutomation
      The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the iOSXCUITFindBy annotation.
      LocatorGroupStrategy selendroidAutomation
      Deprecated. 
      Selendroid driver is going to be deprecated. Use AndroidFindBy instead. It is recommended to use UIAutomator1 for Android API below 21 and UIAutomator2 for API >= 21
      LocatorGroupStrategy windowsAutomation
      The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the WindowsFindBy annotation.

    • Element Detail

      • androidAutomation

        public abstract LocatorGroupStrategy androidAutomation
        The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the AndroidFindBy annotation. These annotations can define the chained searching or the searching by all possible locators.
        Returns:
        the strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the AndroidFindBy annotation
        Default:
        io.appium.java_client.pagefactory.LocatorGroupStrategy.CHAIN

      • selendroidAutomation

        @Deprecated
public abstract LocatorGroupStrategy selendroidAutomation
        Deprecated. Selendroid driver is going to be deprecated. Use AndroidFindBy instead. It is recommended to use UIAutomator1 for Android API below 21 and UIAutomator2 for API >= 21
        The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the SelendroidFindBy annotation. These annotations can define the chained searching or the searching by all possible locators.
        Returns:
        the strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the SelendroidFindBy annotation
        Default:
        io.appium.java_client.pagefactory.LocatorGroupStrategy.CHAIN

      • iOSAutomation

        @Deprecated
public abstract LocatorGroupStrategy iOSAutomation
        Deprecated. UIAutomation is going to get deprecated. It is recommended to use XCUITest
        The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the iOSFindBy annotation. These annotations can define the chained searching or the searching by all possible locators.
        Returns:
        the strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the iOSFindBy annotation
        Default:
        io.appium.java_client.pagefactory.LocatorGroupStrategy.CHAIN

      • windowsAutomation

        public abstract LocatorGroupStrategy windowsAutomation
        The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the WindowsFindBy annotation. These annotations can define the chained searching or the searching by all possible locators.
        Returns:
        the strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the WindowsFindBy annotation
        Default:
        io.appium.java_client.pagefactory.LocatorGroupStrategy.CHAIN

      • iOSXCUITAutomation

        public abstract LocatorGroupStrategy iOSXCUITAutomation
        The strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the iOSXCUITFindBy annotation. These annotations can define the chained searching or the searching by all possible locators.
        Returns:
        the strategy which defines how to use locators which are described by the iOSXCUITFindBy annotation
        Default:
